channel.title: How to display and process forms in a Joomla article using DirectPHP?
channel.description: Discuss How to display and process forms in a Joomla article using DirectPHP?

item.title: kksou says:
item.description: Hi Brown, The id is the article id. If you go to your joomla backend - Content - Articles. The ID you see in the rightmost column is the article id. In Joomla, to go to a particular Joomla article, you will need to specify these 4 parameters - option, itemid, id (which is the article id) and view. Warm Regards, /kksou
item.dc:creator: kksou

item.title: kksou says:
item.description: Hi Stathes, Sorry for the late reply. DirectPHP uses the standard PHP eval() function. Please change "/~trailpro" to fullpath. If you have coded using raw PHP, PHP does not know ~. So you have to use the fullpath e.g. /var/www/... or /home/domain/... Please give it a try and see if it works. Warm Regards, /kksou
